headline: OCEANIA CRUISES INVITES GUESTS TO EMBRACE THE HOLIDAY SPIRIT WITH EXTRAORDINARY FESTIVE VOYAGES
summary: Oceania Cruises®, the world's leading culinary- and destination-focused cruise line, invites travelers to embark on magical holiday celebrations, complete with gourmet feasts, dazzling entertainment, and visits to enticing ports of call across the 2025-2026 and 2026-2027 seasons.

headline: DoubleDown Q1 Earnings & Revenues Miss Estimates, ARPDAU Up Y/Y
summary: DDI's first-quarter 2025 top line suffers due to dismal social casino/free-to-play games revenues.

raw.headline: DoubleDown Q1 Earnings & Revenues Miss Estimates, ARPDAU Up Y/Y
raw.summary: DDI's first-quarter 2025 top line suffers due to dismal social casino/free-to-play games revenues.

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NYSE:NCLH) Sees 18% Stock Rise In Last Month
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NYSE:NCLH) increased its board size and welcomed Ms. Linda P. Jojo as a new member. The debut of Norwegian Aqua with innovative features, alongside revitalization projects for Norwegian Epic and Pride of America, showcased the company's commitment to enhancing guest experiences. Despite reporting a Q1 net loss, the company's robust product announcements may have supported an 18% share price rise over the last month, significantly outpacing the market's 4%...
